product_name: Salomon X3 60 T Ski Boots - Kids' - 2013/2014
long_description: Built with input from junior race clubs, the Salomon X3 60 T ski boots are packed with performance for young skiers. Thermicfit liner wraps the foot and lower leg in warmth and comfort; soft foam footbeds conform to the rapid growth of children's feet. The Salomon X3 60 T ski boots offer a soft flex appropriate for kids. The Salomon X3 60 T ski boots are offered in Mondo sizes 22 - 25.5, which correspond to US kids' sizes 4 - 7; Mondo sizing is a standardized ski industry sizing system. Boots feature 4 buckles and a high cuff height for older kids with longer legs.
